subject: Order #SSN5239 Simsonn prox ultra pedals arrived without haptics
description_text:
I ordered the pedals with baseplate and haptics, the motors did not arrive
with the order.

conversations.body_text: Hi ColDe pauley,  Most likely, the pedals were shipped from our U.S. warehouse, while the VAM Pro motors were shipped from China, so they were sent in separate packages.

Do I get a separate tracking number?


On Sat, Jan 3, 2026, 8:17 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi ColDe pauley,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks—this item is incredibly popular. We'll ship yours within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the delay.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201467985
